verses.roman:
śrī-aṅga, śrī-mukha yei kare daraśana
tāra pāpa-kṣaya haya, pāya prema-dhana

synonyms: śrī-aṅga—His body; śrī-mukha—His face; yei—anyone who; kare—does; daraśana—seeing; tāra—of him; pāpa-kṣaya—destruction of sins; haya—there is; pāya—obtains; prema-dhana—the wealth of love of Godhead.
translation: Anyone who looks upon His beautiful body or beautiful face becomes freed from all sins and obtains the wealth of love of Godhead.
